FuncDef: The domain-name command configures the domain name suffix for the DHCP client. The undo domain-name command deletes a configured domain name suffix. By default, no domain name suffix is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. If the string is enclosed in double quotation marks ("), spaces are allowed in the string.
